title: Ninjas Don’t Hide — They Just Move Faster
text: Ninjas aren’t hiding, they’re already gone before you blink. Speed is theirsecret, and you’ll never catch them in action. Things disappear? Probably a ninja atwork. Being fast isn’t a talent—it’s a lifestyle.

title: Silent but Awesome
text: It’s quiet… too quiet. That usually means a ninja is nearby. They never makenoise, yet amazing stuff happens around them. When things magically get fixed, a ninjaprobably did it.

title: Certified Shadow
text: Shadows are a ninja’s playground. They’ve spent so long in the dark, theymight as well live there. When everything else fails, trust the shadows. Mastering theart of hiding in plain sight is harder than it looks.

title: Ninjas: Masters of Showing Up
text: You never see them coming. Ninjas appear when you least expect it—usually atthe worst possible moment. Surprise is their favorite tactic, scaring everyoneincluded. If you feel watched… congratulations, you’re probably right.

title: Stealth Mode: On
text: Stealth isn’t a switch; it’s a ninja default. They’re so quiet, even silencegets jealous. If you think you saw one, you didn’t. But don’t worry… they’vedefinitely seen you.
